CustomField.description: BODEV-1669: Add CSM Owner email to Order to pass it to NetSuite. Used for the invoice reminder process.
CustomField.formula:
IF( Account.CSM_Owner__c = "0050d000006PCLm" || /* Bynder Success Squad */ Account.CSM_Owner__c = "0050d000006PBk2", /* Webdam Success Squad */ "", Account.CSM_Owner_Email__c )
/* Do not sync Success Squad email when they are CSM Owner */
CustomField.label: CSM Owner Email
